source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_00<tab>It looks like Loupard has some good news for you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_00<tab>テイルフェザーのルーパルは、いい報せを受けたようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_01<tab>Loupard has received information that a lone chocobo has been spotted wandering around to the south of Tailfeather. He suggests that such an easy mark would make the ideal first catch for the novice hunter Q'yantaa. Speak to her and see if she has any ideas regarding catching the bird.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_01<tab>ルーパルに、狩りやすそうなチョコボの情報をもらった。高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーにいる「キ・ヤンター」に話しかけ、彼女の初陣に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_02<tab>Q'yantaa's informed hunting strategy is to set up traps to the north of Tailfeather instead of the south, outwitting all of the other hunters. It becomes clear that while inexperienced, and sometimes over-enthusiastic, Q'yantaa does possess some measure of hunting instinct. Place her special concoction─some very fragrant gysahl greens─at the designated area to see if Q'yantaa's instincts bear any reward.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_02<tab>キ・ヤンターからチョコボ狩りの作戦を聞いた。テイルフェザー北のチョコボの森にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9C7201 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7E01 /var>」を設置しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_03<tab>You have placed the fragrant greens, glad to be rid of their pungent odor. Speak with Q'yantaa at the chocobo hunters' camp to the north.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8B7E01 /var>を設置した。テイルフェザー北のキャンプにいる「キ・ヤンター」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_04<tab>As if by fate, you hear the cry of a chocobo coming from where you set the trap just moments after you meet Q'yantaa in the northern camp. Hurry to see whether or not the chocobo fell for Q'yantaa's tricky concoction.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_04<tab>キ・ヤンターは、チョコボの鳴き声を聞きつけたようだ。テイルフェザー北のチョコボの森で「キ・ヤンター」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_05<tab>You find a chocobo asleep peacefully near where the trap was set, and Q'yantaa exclaims her happiness in a barely legible manner. Return to Tailfeather and report the success of your unlikely duo to Loupard.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_05<tab>キ・ヤンターと合流した。彼女は、もくろみどおりチョコボが罠にかかったことで、大喜びだ。テイルフェザーの「ルーパル」に、初陣の成功を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_06<tab>Loupard can barely contain his disbelief when you tell him that Q'yantaa's scheme actually managed to catch something. Both he and you gain a newfound respect for the hunting instincts of the Miqo'te.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_SEQ_06<tab>ルーパルに報告した。彼は、キ・ヤンターの才能に感動しているようだ。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_002Gonna dig me a hole,♪
Gonna trap a bird in it,♪
Gonna take this sharpened axe...♪
...Oh, partner! Ain't hunting grand!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_002チョ、チョコ、チョコチョコ、チョッコボー♪
狩ーるぞ、狩るぞ狩るーぞ♪

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the whole camp's in a hubbub! Seems a lone chocobo's been sighted wanderin' around not too far south, waitin' for a pair of hunters to come snatch it up. An easy target'll make the perfect first hunt for Q'yantaa.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_000よお、さっき報せがあったんだが、
集落の近くで、手頃なチョコボが目撃されたそうだ。
ヤンターの狩猟始めには、持ってこいだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_001<tab>Now, don't go thinkin' this bird'll just walk right into your traps─Q'yantaa's still as green as they come. Go with her an' lend a hand afore she misses out on her first catch.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_001なに、最初から上手くいくとは思ってないけどさ。
ふたりで一緒に、狩りにいってみてくれないか？
出発の準備ができたら、ヤンターに声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_017<tab>This chocobo seems like an easy catch, but it'll slip by if you ain't careful.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_017なに、最初から上手くいくとは思ってないけどさ。
ふたりで一緒に、狩りにいってみてくれないか？
出発の準備ができたら、ヤンターに声をかけてくれ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_010<tab>You heard Loupard! What're you waiting for, partner─that chocobo's not gonna catch itself!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_010へへん、話は聞いてたよ！
相方さん、さっそく狩りにいこうじゃない！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_011<tab>Ah, wait─before I forget... Ah hah! This is the special mixture I made outta those mushrooms and some gysahl greens. Fragrant, aren't they?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_011そうそう、例のブツも渡しておくね！
ロウソクダケの粉末を振りかけた、
特製の「」だよ、大事にしてよぉ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_012<tab>The chocobo we're aiming to nab's been sighted to the south, which means plenty of hunters that <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> they're clever set up traps there. Lucky for us, though, I've thought one step ahead.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_012目的のチョコボは、集落の南で目撃されたらしいわ。
ほかの猟師たちも、その辺りに罠を仕掛けてるみたい！
でも、私、ちょっと考えてみたの……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_013<tab>You see, since so many hunters've been down south, their scent'll be as plain to the bird as this mushroom's is to us. Now if <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was a chocobo, I'd steer well clear of that place.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_013たくさんの猟師たちが罠を張ったなら、
その場所には人の匂いが強く残ってしまうはず……。
そうなると、チョコボも警戒するんじゃないかしら？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_014<tab>I might even be inclined to take a slightly more dangerous route so as to not run into any hunters. Now, if my instincts're right, that chocobo'll go right through bandersnatch territory. That's why we gotta set up <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> traps to the north. Brilliant idea, ain't it?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_014……だとすると、多少の危険を冒しても、
バンダースナッチの縄張りまで逃げているかも。
だから、私たちは……北に罠を仕掛けましょ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_015<tab>What's that? Don't tell me you're scared of the big bad bandersnatches! Just tread lightly and we'll both come back with a new chocobo. Here, let's divide up the greens and get to setting our traps.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_015獰猛なバンダースナッチだって、注意すれば大丈夫！
さあ、行くわよ！
手分けして、を設置しましょ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_016<tab>Once everything's set up, let's meet at the hunters' camp to the north. Good luck, partner!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_016あぁ、それから……エサを仕掛け終わったら、
北にある猟師のキャンプに集合ね！
よろしく～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_020<tab>What took you so long!? I finished setting up <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> trap bells ago! So, are the gysahl greens in their place?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_020もう、遅いわよ～、待ってたんだから！
、ちゃんと置いてきたでしょうね～？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_021<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> I could count on my partner! I hope you didn't taste any, because I put a little something extra in my gysahl greens: sleeping powder! Once that chocobo falls for my trap it'll fall into a deep sleep! Genius!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_021よーしよし♪
あの野菜にはね、眠り薬もかけておいたの。
チョコボがあれを食べたら、グウグウ寝ちゃうはずよ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_022<tab>Did you hear that!? Was that...a chocobo cry!? It was over in the direction of your trap─let's go, partner!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_022……いま、チョコボの鳴き声がしたわよね！？
場所は……あなたが罠を仕掛けた方だわ！
行ってみましょ！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_030<tab>Can you believe it!? It's a genuine bona fide drowsified chocobo! See, hunting's easy!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_030うっそ～、信じられる！？
チョコボよ、チョコボ！
本物のチョ、コ、ボ！！　やったわ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_031<tab>My plan worked perfectly! I'll take the chocobo back to Tailfeather. Partner, could you go and tell Loupard that I'm a <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> hunter now?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_031この子は、私がちゃ～んと連れていくから、
あなたは先に戻って、ルーパルさんに伝えておいてくれる？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_044<tab>I'll do the heavy lifting this time. Go ahead and tell Loupard of our success!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_QYANTAA_000_044この子は、私がちゃ～んと連れていくから、
あなたは先に戻って、ルーパルさんに伝えておいてくれる？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_039<tab>How're you and that wily Miqo'te faring?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_039<tab>よう、ヤンターはうまくやってたか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_040<tab>You don't say! Q'yantaa actually bagged a bird!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_040なんだって！？
ヤンターが、チョコボを獲っただって！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_041<tab>I ain't never seen a hunter get a chocobo on their first outing... I guess what they say about Miqo'te is true.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_041どうなることかと思っていたが、
まさか、初陣で成果があるとは見事なもんだな……。
さすがは生まれついての狩人、ミコッテ族といったところか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_042<tab>Can't leave <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, the unsung hero, without <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> bit of praise either. If things keep goin' this well then we may not even need to find a partner!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ207_01776_LOUPARD_000_042それに君の協力も功を奏したようだな。
礼を言わせてほしい……どうもありがとう！
